head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths FOLSTEIN, RUTH M.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths FOLSTEIN, RUTH M.

block.p: FOLSTEIN-Ruth M. Beloved wife of the late Dr. Marvin Folstein. Devoted mother of Lois, Alan and the late Randi. Loving mother-inlaw of Amy. Cherished grandmother of Gabriel. Dear sister of Herbert Brumberg. Service today 11:30AM, ''Parkside'' Memorial Chapels, 2576 Flatbush Avenue, Brooklyn (near Avenue V).
